description: Capabilities document of a Earth-Observation Time-Series filter service
title: eotsfilter service

___name.description: The complete name of the filter

___alias.description: The short name of the filter

___parameters.description: The list of parameters of the filter

___keymin.description: The minimum value of the parameter

___keytype.description: The description of the type of the parameter

___keymax.description: The maximum value of the parameter

___domain.description: The optional names of the values of the parameter

___default.description: The default value of the parameter

___missingdata.description: Does the filter support the use of missing data?
